pullrequest.title: Fix homebrew build and clean up some cmake

content.raw:
The pipeline is passing but the jenkins CI requires a few pull requests to be merged.

## Ubuntu

* with this PR: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/665/adding-support-for-ign-gazebo/diff
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=5)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/5/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/5/

## Homebrew

* with this PR: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/697/handle-projects-without-major-version-in/diff
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=5)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/5/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/5/
